# uptrace Provider

Interact with Uptrace API to manage monitors, dashboards, and alerts.

## Example Usage

```terraform
terraform {
  required_providers {
    uptrace = {
      source = "riccap/uptrace"
    }
  }
}

provider "uptrace" {
  endpoint   = "https://api2.uptrace.dev"
  token      = var.uptrace_token
  project_id = var.uptrace_project_id
}

variable "uptrace_token" {
  description = "Uptrace API token"
  type        = string
  sensitive   = true
}

variable "uptrace_project_id" {
  description = "Uptrace project ID"
  type        = number
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `endpoint` (String) The Uptrace API endpoint. May also be provided via UPTRACE_ENDPOINT environment variable.
- `project_id` (Number) The default project ID for Uptrace operations. May also be provided via UPTRACE_PROJECT_ID environment variable.
- `token` (String, Sensitive) The authentication token for Uptrace API. May also be provided via UPTRACE_TOKEN environment variable.
